lyrics.text: What makes me put up with you is that i see your eyes
All of the love in the world
You made me not sleep, You made my heart carry concerns
And you don't care, you made my days very long
And this is my life with you, your love had made me suffer a lot (x2)
These are long nights, I have been like this for long (x2)
I see you while your far away
My longness to you is increasing
When your eyes meet me I hear the disappointment
Our love is written, you can't run away from love
I am just like you melting in love
And this is my life with you, your love had made me suffer a lot (x2)
These are long nights, I have been like this for long (x2)
our sun has gone but we're still in day,our dream is still in our land even if it will become on fire.
birds laughing voices made us dream,what is our fault and what is country fault,the world has forgotten us.
our sun has gone but if we feel that we're on one big heart and we take care of it,we will say loudly until our voices reach,isn't that our dream?
our sun has gone but life still exists,whatever happened we will live our dreams.
come closer and love people,because peace is sense and that is our dream
birds laughing voices made us dream,what is our fault and what is country fault,the world has forgotten us.
come closer and love people,because peace is sense and that is our dream
غابت شمسنا بس احنا لينا نهار
الحلم لسه فى ارضنا لوحتى صبحت نار
غابت شمسنا بس احنا لينا نهار
الحلم لسه فى ارضنا لوحتى صبحت نار
Have you seen what happened in Syria ?
ya, I'm going to help kids with their chores, make them dinner, pray for them,
shower them early, take them to bed and sing for them.
I'm exhausted, so I'm going to do ironing tomorrow
Get us, please, some bread, a pack of sugar and cheese. try please
not to stay up late to the midnight
Babe, what Bread and sugar are you talking about ? Why can't you see none but yourself ?
There is a country dying of people saying only ME.
Babe, feast is so soon, spare a couple of bucks.
don't skip it as usual saying "I'm having a bad time"
Who said anything about the feast ? why can't you feel ?
It's a country dying because no one can feel
I'm pretending that I'm not listening not to break down
I'm having too much pain that I'm afraid to share with anybody
I'm afraid for tomorrow, of tomorrow*. Afraid that it might be pains are yet coming
My heart has already died, although it insists to look alive
Some people are broken by expatriation, some are hating expatriation**
and some are forced to depart, still carrying their country inside
That't the whole thing, Syria. A homeland is dying because all are
not listening, not understanding, not feeling
Yes, I understood. I'll bring the bread and sugar
Haseeb elmekwa di lebokra 3shan ta3bana mosh 2adra
Whatlena 3eish w kees sokkar w gebna ya reet wlaw te2dar matesharshi leno9 elleil
-   7abibti 3eish w sokkar eih wleeh mosh shayfah gheir nafsek
=  7abibi el3aid 5la9 2arrab f sheilly kam gini 3ala ganb
Balash kal3ada tetharrab we teegi t2oully w9’a3ak 9a3b
-   W meen gab bass seirt al3aid weleeh mosh 7assah belmou9,ou3
=   7abibi ana 3amla mosh sam3ak 3ashan 5ayfa la yowm ethad
Mana men kotr awga3i ba5aaf aw9af mesha3ri le7add
Ba5aaf 3ala bokra men bokra.. w5aaf dayeman ana men lgayy
W 2albi maat 3ala fekra lakennoh mo99er ye6’har 7ayy
Fi naas elghorbah kasserha w naas el ghorba karhaha
W naas mo9’6art f batba3ed w shayla baladha gowwaha
W howay a Sourya dah almow9’ou3
Wa6an betmout 3ashan elkul mosh saame3, mosh fahem, mosh 7ases, 2aal nafsi
-    Fehemt 5la9.. Hageeb l3aish wana gay elsokkar wmosh hat2a5ar
حبيبتي شفتي اللي بيحصل في سوريا؟
هسيب المكوة دي لبكره عشان تعبانة مش قادرة
وهاتلنا عيش وكيس سكر وجبنة ياريت ولو تقدر
حبيبتي عيش وسكر ايه؟ وليه مش شايفة غير نفسك؟
بلد بتموت عشان الكل قال نفسي
حبيبي العيد خلاص قرب فشيلي كام جنية على جنب
بلاش كالعادة تتهرب وتيجي تقولي وضعك صعب
ومين جاب بس سيرة العيد؟ وليه مش حاسة بالموضوع" ؟
بلد بتموت عشان الكل، عشان الكل مش حاسس
حبيبي انا عاملة مش سامعة عشان خايفة لا يوم اتهد
منا من كتر أوجاعي بخاف اوصف مشاعري لحد
بخاف على بكرة من بكرة واخاف ليبان آلام الجاي
وقلبي مات على فكرة لكنه مصرّ يظهر حي
في ناس الغربة كاسراها وناس الغربة كارهاها
وناس مضطرة فتبعد وشايلة بلدها جواها
وهو يا سوريا ده الموضوع وطن بيموت عشان الكل
مش سامع مش فاهم مش حاسس
فهمت خلاص، هجيب العيش وانا جي والسكر
